#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

void insertion_sort(int * array,int n)
{
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		int ptr=i-1;
		int temp=array[i];
		while(array[ptr]>temp&&ptr>=0)
		{
			array[ptr+1]=array[ptr];
			ptr--;
		}
		array[ptr+1]=temp;
	}
}

int main()
{

int ptr_pie,ptr_rack,t,n,count;
int w_pies[30],rack_limits[30];

//cout<<"enter the number of testcases";

cin>>t;

while(t--)
{
	cin>>n;
	ptr_pie=0,ptr_rack=0,count=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>w_pies[i];			
	}
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>rack_limits[i];
	}
	insertion_sort(w_pies,n);
	insertion_sort(rack_limits,n);
	//print_array(w_pies,n);
	//print_array(rack_limits,n);
	while(ptr_rack<n)
	{
		if(w_pies[ptr_pie]>rack_limits[ptr_rack])
			ptr_rack++;
		else
		{
			ptr_pie++;
			ptr_rack++;
			count++;
		}
		//cout<<"ptr_rack:"<<ptr_rack<<"ptr_pie:"<<ptr_pie<<"count"<<count<<endl;
	}
	cout<<count<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
